meta.description: Our free email newsletter is at: http://www.ihealthtube.com/content/newsletter Vaccine researcher and author Neil Miller discusses a new wave of adjuvants for vaccines and what the concern is. Are the things that are replacing aluminum and mercury in vaccines any better or do they bring a different set of health concerns?

title: New Vaccine Ingredients Should Concern You!
cleaned_text:
Our free email newsletter is at: http://www.ihealthtube.com/content/newsletter

Vaccine researcher and author Neil Miller discusses a new wave of adjuvants for vaccines and what the concern is. Are the things that are replacing aluminum and mercury in vaccines any better or do they bring a different set of health concerns?
